Body:
"""Test search with a platform filter."""
res = games_client.quick_search('game name', pybomb.PS1)
assert isinstance(res, Response)
mock_requests_get.assert_called_once_with('http://www.giantbomb.com/api/games',
    params={'filter': f'name:game name,platforms:{pybomb.PS1}', 'api_key':
    'fake_key', 'format': 'json'}, headers={'User-Agent': 'Pybomb {}'.
    format(version)})
